name: The Final Hour (itch)
description:
It was late one night when the Aliens decided to invade. Can the unnamed pilot save day?

*RECOMMENDATION* Download the game to get the best performance. The web build it laggy but the game can be finished on it.

*CONTROLS*

Shoot - Left Mouse

Movement - WASD

Note from the dev:

I spent a month on this side project to help me learn more about development. It is a small 5-10 minute experience that I hope you enjoy. Have fun!
